channel.title: Apt-files not working after Kicksecure installed on Debian
channel.description: Hi, After install Kicksecure related packages on Debian 12, `apt-files search` always tells me "cache is empty" even I execute "apt-files update". I installed `apt install security-misc usability-misc apparmor-profiles-kicksecure sandbox-app-launcher kicksecure-base-files dist-base-files` Please help me to fix this! Thanks in advance

item.title: Apt-files not working after Kicksecure installed on Debian
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please follow documentation:

Kicksecure – 17 Mar 23

apt-file

HowTo: install apt-file. It an be used to show which files are being included by a package.

Read full topic

item.title: Apt-files not working after Kicksecure installed on Debian
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
Hi,
After install Kicksecure related packages on Debian 12, apt-files search always tells me “cache is empty” even I execute “apt-files update”.
I installed apt install security-misc usability-misc apparmor-profiles-kicksecure sandbox-app-launcher kicksecure-base-files dist-base-files
Please help me to fix this!
Thanks in advance

Read full topic
item.source: Apt-files not working after Kicksecure installed on Debian
